parse.title: List of Magic: The Gathering artists

text.*:
This article does not cite any sources. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. (July 2013) (Learn how and when to remove this template message)

This is a list of artists who have contributed art to the game of Magic: The Gathering. While 25 artists contributed art to the original Alpha Magic set, 418 different artists illustrated Magic cards through Shards of Alara. Ron Spencer, Mark Tedin, and Pete Venters were the final original artists from Alpha to be active (each had their most recent new piece in Magic 2011). Spencer is also amongst the seven artists that have contributed more than 200 pieces for Magic, notable others being Greg Staples, Pete Venters, and Kev Walker. Walker is notable for having nearly 400 cards featuring his art (396 as of Kaladesh) and is currently the most-featured artist by a large margin.

The list refers to the earliest printing of a given piece of art.

Split cards with both sides by the same artist count as 2 separate pieces.

This list is incomplete; you can help by expanding it.
